item.title: 🍄Fungus found on 14 Sep 2024
item.description: 1. Fleecyfoot Conecap🍄 # It may be Fleecyfoot Conecap. It contains the psychedelic alkaloids psilocybin and psilocin. https://www.gbif.org/species/2529949 2. Grey Knight🍄 # It may be Grey Knight - Tricholoma terreum.
